Description: Body fragment of Fikellura painted pottery neck-amphora; shoulder, myrtle wreath. Belly, crescents, lotus flowers and buds, unjoined.
Curator's comments: BSA xxxiv, 13 (G 6), 14, 74. Attributed to the Mykonos Group (Cook G 6). With BM GR 1888,0208.56.o (previously registered as 1924,1201.1074 and 1075), 1888,0208.54.f (previously registered as 1924,1201.1076) and 1888,0208.54.h (previously registered as 1924,1201.1078). Original total height of amphora 25 cm.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 577, 4)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 205)
